name: Snicky Snackies
author: Kevin Ryan
summary: You've heard of caramel corn, but how about caramel pretzels? This makes a super crunchy, salty and sweet snack!
directions: Preheat oven to 250 degrees F (120 degrees C)
In a 9x13-inch baking dish, combine the pretzels and nuts
In a large saucepan combine the butter, sugar, corn syrup and salt
Stir together over medium heat until sugar dissolves
Bring to a boil and cook until very thick and at the 'firm ball' stage (260 degrees F, 125 degrees C)
Remove from heat, pour over pretzel/nut mixture and mix all together
Bake in the preheated oven for 20 minutes, stirring after 10 minutes
Remove from oven and spread out on wax paper to cool
